metadata.Title: CVE-2022-30787 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An integer underflow in fuse_lib_readdir enables arbitrary memory read operations in NTFS-3G through 2021.8.22 when using libfuse-lite.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-30787` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libntfs-3g88 - 1:2017.3.23-2ubuntu0.18.04.4
ntfs-3g - 1:2017.3.23-2ubuntu0.18.04.4
No subscription required
